title: Enhancing Customer Service Practical Competencies: Machine Learning-Based Design for Organic Rankine Cycle Optimization

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of core concepts and intermediate-level application skills
context.additional_context: Service/Customer Engagement Role-Specific Competency Development Program

learning_goals: The fundamental principles and components of the organic Rankine cycle can be explained
Analyze limitations of existing ORC design methods and propose machine learning integration possibilities
Develop ORC optimization models utilizing machine learning techniques like ANN (Artificial Neural Networks)
Perform ORC system performance predictions based on actual industrial data
Evaluate economic feasibility of optimal working fluid selection and cycle configuration strategies
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
